about.title: About {{ProductFullName}} API
about.h1: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/editor/{{ProductCode}}/) API is a right choice to edit Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Open Office documents and presentations. GroupDocs.Editor is a standalone API that is suitable for server side and back-end systems where high performance is required. It does not depend on any software like Microsoft or Open Office.

content_left.description: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/editor/{{ProductCode}}/) provides an easy and straightforward way for developers to edit the {{EXT}} files using a few lines of code.
content_left.step_1: Create an instance of [`GroupDocs.Editor.Editor`](https://apireference.groupdocs.com/net/editor/groupdocs.editor/editor) class and load the {{EXT}} file with full path
content_left.step_2: Create & set the [`WordProcessingEditOptions`](https://apireference.groupdocs.com/net/editor/groupdocs.editor.options/wordprocessingeditoptions) class instance for the {{EXT}} file format
content_left.step_3: Call [`GroupDocs.Editor.Editor.Edit()`](https://apireference.groupdocs.com/editor/net/groupdocs.editor.editor/edit/methods/1) method and obtain {{EXT}} document in HTML format that is easily editable with any WYSIWYG-editor.
content_left.step_4: Call [`GroupDocs.Editor.Editor.Save()`](https://apireference.groupdocs.com/editor/net/groupdocs.editor/editor/methods/save) method and save edited {{EXT}} file
